text: Bad Moon Rising is the second album by Sonic Youth. It has recieved generally mixed reviews. ==Tracklist== #"Intro" 1:12 #"Brave Men Run" 3:54 #"Society Is A Hole" 5:45 #"I Love Her All The Time" 8:22 #"Ghost Bitch" 5:41 #"I'm Insane" 4:07 #"Justice Is Might" 4:22 #"Death Valley '69" 5:22 #"Satan Is Boring (bonus track)" 5:13 #"Flower (bonus track)" 3:34 #"Halloween (bonus track)" 5:16 #"Echo Canyon (hidden track)" 1:08 Category:Sonic Youth albums Category:1985 albums
title: Bad Moon Rising (album)
